name: Food
description: Learn how you can become more sustainable within specific ingredients, supermarkets, and food wastage.

name: Fashion
description: Learn about sustainable materials, fashion industry practices, and how to read clothing tags for long-lasting fashion articles that look good on you and the planet.

name: Home
description: Learn about affordable sustainable materials, the most efficient way to maximize energy usage and buying long lasting products for your home.

name: Transportation
description: Learn about eco-friendly transportation options such as public transportation, electric vehicles, biking, and carpooling to minimize your carbon footprint.

name: Cosmetics
description: Learn more about more sustainable brands that use the best minerals and ingredients for the environment!

description: Learn how you can reduce waste in your daily life and spendings to be more sustainable for the environment, and maybe save a few bucks too.

name: Clean Energy
description: Learn about the different types of clean energy and how they create electricity without burning fossil fuels.

name: Pets
description: Learn about the most sustainable foods and best grooming equipment you can find for your pets. The cutest pet accessories may not be more than a mile away!
